subject: Surfing
Contests and Prizes
lead_paragraph: Greg Long, 24, won the Mavericks Surf Contest at Pilar Point in Half Moon Bay on Saturday, one of the world’s premier big-wave surfing competitions.
snippet: Greg Long, 24, won the Mavericks Surf Contest at Pilar Point in Half Moon Bay on Saturday, one of the world’s premier big-wave surfing competitions.
